content.query:
USE costmgmt
GO

CREATE OR ALTER VIEW RIRecommendations
AS

SELECT
    *
FROM
    OPENROWSET(
        BULK 'https://s037costmgmt.dfs.core.windows.net/reservations/portal-export/FinOps-ReservationRecommendations-VMs-Daily/*/*.csv',
        FORMAT = 'CSV',
        PARSER_VERSION = '2.0',
        HEADER_ROW = TRUE
    ) AS [result]
